title: How to Play Your Music on a Xbox 360 Game

steps.headline: Load your chosen music.
steps.description:
Either make sure that there are no games on the disk drive and burn a music CD into your hard drive. Or, connect your MP3 player to your Xbox with a USB cord. {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/4\/45\/Play-Your-Music-on-a-Xbox-360-Game-Step-1Bullet2.jpg\/v4-460px-Play-Your-Music-on-a-Xbox-360-Game-Step-1Bullet2.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/4\/45\/Play-Your-Music-on-a-Xbox-360-Game-Step-1Bullet2.jpg\/v4-760px-Play-Your-Music-on-a-Xbox-360-Game-Step-1Bullet2.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570,"licensing":"

steps.headline: Press the Xbox Guide button on your controller while playing.

text:
Load your chosen music. Either make sure that there are no games on the disk drive and burn a music CD into your hard drive. Or, connect your MP3 player to your Xbox with a USB cord. {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/4\/45\/Play-Your-Music-on-a-Xbox-360-Game-Step-1Bullet2.jpg\/v4-460px-Play-Your-Music-on-a-Xbox-360-Game-Step-1Bullet2.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/4\/45\/Play-Your-Music-on-a-Xbox-360-Game-Step-1Bullet2.jpg\/v4-760px-Play-Your-Music-on-a-Xbox-360-Game-Step-1Bullet2.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570,"licensing":"

License: Fair Use<\/a> (screenshot)
\n<\/p><\/div>"} Press the Xbox Guide button on your controller while playing. Select "Music". Choose your album and song. Resume playing.
